backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining products, updates, contact submissions, user profiles, logo storage, and admin/user authorization with state management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs for project tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten one‑sentence summaries for numerous frontend source files.
frontend/docs/custom-domain.md: Documentation explaining how to configure a custom domain for the Beemedha Internet Computer deployment.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining fonts, theme variables, color palette, and utility classes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with all public and admin routes, including the new /admin/logo page.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Component enforcing admin access, handling login, admin checks, and invoking makeMeAdmin when unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache reset on logout.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandPrimi: Defines styled wrapper components (Section, Container, BrandCard, BrandBadge, BrandButton) that extend base UI elements with brand-specific classes.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Implements the site footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and a newsletter signup form with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Renders the site header with logo, navigation, admin link, mobile menu, and dynamic logo loading with cleanup.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main page layout including header, footer, outlet content, background pattern, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsCard.ts: Displays a news/update card showing type badge, date, title, and truncated message, linking to a detailed news page.
frontend/src/components/products/PriceDi: Shows formatted product pricing with optional discount, original price, and size-based styling.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Renders a product preview card with image, name, availability, description, price, and variant count, linking to product details.
frontend/src/components/products/Purchas: Shows a disabled purchase button and alert indicating checkout is not yet available.
frontend/src/components/products/Variant: Provides UI for selecting weight or flavor variants and notifies parent of selected price and label.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login state, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveUpdateConfig.t: Returns polling and refetch settings for react-query, enabling periodic data updates.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Updates the document title and meta description when a page loads or its metadata changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for fetching and mutating product, category, and contact data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Re-exports the root stylesheet by importing the parent index.css file.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the main App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the Beemedha About page with brand story content, imagery, and metadata setup.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Provides an admin dashboard with navigation cards for managing products, news, and branding.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLogoPage.t: Allows admins to upload, preview, validate, and update the site logo using backend queries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNewsPage.t: Enables admins to create, list, sort, and delete product-related news updates tied to products.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin UI for listing, searching, filtering, creating, editing, and deleting products with variant support and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/CertificationsPage.ts: Displays certification, quality assurance, and testing information for Beemedha products with accompanying visuals.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements the contact page with a form, submission handling, success/error alerts, and page metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero banner, navigation buttons, and trust highlight cards promoting natural, pure, and lab‑tested honey.
frontend/src/pages/NewsDetailPage.tsx: Displays details for a single news update, including type badge, date, message, and a related product section.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Shows a tab‑filtered list of product updates sorted by timestamp with loading states and last‑updated info.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Presents the site's privacy policy with sections on data collection, usage, sharing, and security.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product information with images, availability badges, variant selection, pricing, and related updates.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays product listings with category tabs, loading states, and last-updated info fetched from product queries.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the site's terms and conditions with structured sections and static legal content.
frontend/src/utils/assets.ts: Utility that encodes the filename portion of asset paths to ensure image URLs with special characters load correctly.
frontend/src/utils/logo.ts: Utilities to convert backend logo binary data into a browser URL and revoke it when no longer needed.
frontend/src/utils/price.ts: Helpers for formatting INR prices, detecting discounts, computing percentages, and producing display-ready pricing data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, requirements, and pending requests related to persistent admin-managed logo uploads.
